{{Wired embedded system |brand=USRobotics |model=USR8004 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=07/2005 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=7.5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.5 |pwr_barrel_len=8 |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Infineon |cpu1_model=ADM5120P;ADM5120P, AB0526, HA1Z518018X01SL; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BBTC-90G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=4 MiB |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V161610ETP-7 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.123.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:14:C1, 00:C0:49 |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols= |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |802dot11_protocols= |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ch= |oui= }} {{TagLine|Broadband Router}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=USRobotics|vs_id=8004}} [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/27267-cheaprouterroundup?start=8 On '''SmallNetBuilder''''s ''Cheap Router Roundup'' circa 2006] :"KN160453X7", "V03", and a date code of '''0530''' (July 2005) is silkscreened on the board. The power adapter included with the device is a '''U.S.Robotics''' P/N NR15.0010.00 model YP-040 (7.5V DC, 1A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Images== File:USR USR8004 angled.jpg|stock photo File:USR USR8004 label.jpg|label File:USR USR8004 power adapter.jpg|power adapter [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] File:USR USR8004 board top.jpg|board top File:USR USR8004 board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
